mapper.insert: insert into Study_CenterInfo( centerCode, centerName, centerTel, unitPrice, operTimeStart, operTimeEnd, unitTime, ratingScore, ratingNum, centerAdd1, centerAdd2, centerAdd3, minTime, premiumRate, surchageTime) values(#{centerCode}, #{centerName}, #{centerTel}, #{unitPrice}, #{operTimeStart}, #{operTimeEnd}, #{unitTime}, #{ratingScore}, #{ratingNum}, #{centerAdd1}, #{centerAdd2}, #{centerAdd3}, #{minTime}, #{premiumRate}, #{surchageTime})

insert into Study_CenterContents( centerCode, centerPhoto, centerIntroduce, centerFareInfo, centerUseInfo, roomPhoto1, roomPhoto2, roomPhoto3, roomPhoto4, roomPhoto5, roomPhoto6, roomPhoto7, roomPhoto8, roomPhoto9, roomPhoto10) values(#{centerCode}, #{centerPhoto}, #{centerIntroduce}, #{centerFareInfo}, #{centerUseInfo}, #{roomPhoto1}, #{roomPhoto2}, #{roomPhoto3}, #{roomPhoto4}, #{roomPhoto5}, #{roomPhoto6}, #{roomPhoto7}, #{roomPhoto8}, #{roomPhoto9}, #{roomPhoto10})
insert into Study_CenterFacility( centerCode, locker, projector, printer, notebook, whiteBoard) values(#{centerCode}, #{locker}, #{projector}, #{printer}, #{noteBook}, #{whiteBoard})
insert into Study_RoomInfo( roomCode, roomName, centerCode, scale) values(#{roomCode}, #{roomName}, #{centerCode}, #{scale})
mapper.select: select * from Study_RoomInfo where centerCode = #{centerCode} order by roomName asc
select * from STUDY_CENTERINFO order by CenterCode desc

select * from (select rowNum as recNum, centerCode, centerName, centerTel, unitPrice, operTimeStart, operTimeEnd, unitTime, minTime, PremiumRate, surchageTime, ratingScore,ratingNum,centerAdd1,centerAdd2,centerAdd3 from STUDY_CENTERINFO where centerCode like '%'||#{centerCode}||'%'
order by centerCode desc) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select * from (select rowNum as recNum, centerCode, centerName, centerTel, unitPrice, operTimeStart, operTimeEnd, unitTime, minTime, PremiumRate, surchageTime, ratingScore,ratingNum,centerAdd1,centerAdd2,centerAdd3 from STUDY_CENTERINFO where centerName like '%'||#{centerName}||'%'
order by centerCode desc) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select * from (select rowNum as recNum, centerCode, centerName, centerTel, unitPrice, operTimeStart, operTimeEnd, unitTime, minTime, PremiumRate, surchageTime, ratingScore,ratingNum,centerAdd1,centerAdd2,centerAdd3 from STUDY_CENTERINFO where centerTel '%'||#{centerTel}||'%'
order by centerCode desc) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select * from (select rowNum as recNum, centerCode, centerName, centerTel, unitPrice, operTimeStart, operTimeEnd, unitTime, minTime, PremiumRate, surchageTime, ratingScore,ratingNum,centerAdd1,centerAdd2,centerAdd3 from STUDY_CENTERINFO where 1=1
order by centerCode desc) where recNum between (#{page}-1)*10+1 and #{page}*10

select count(*) from STUDY_CENTERINFO where centerCode like '%'||#{centerCode}||'%'
order by centerCode desc

select count(*) from STUDY_CENTERINFO where centerName like '%'||#{centerName}||'%'
order by centerCode desc

select count(*) from STUDY_CENTERINFO where centerTel like '%'||#{centerTel}||'%'
order by centerCode desc

select count(*) from STUDY_CENTERINFO where 1=1
order by centerCode desc

select centerCode from Study_CenterInfo where centerAdd1 = #{searchAdd1} and centerAdd2 = #{searchAdd2}
order by unitPrice asc
order by ratingScore desc
order by centerName asc
select max(scale) from ( select scale from study_roominfo where centerCode = #{centerCode} )

select Study_CenterInfo.centerCode, Study_CenterInfo.centerName, Study_CenterInfo.centerTel, Study_CenterInfo.unitPrice, Study_CenterInfo.operTimeStart, Study_CenterInfo.operTimeEnd, Study_CenterInfo.unitTime, Study_CenterInfo.ratingScore, Study_CenterInfo.ratingNum, Study_CenterInfo.centerAdd1, Study_CenterInfo.centerAdd2, Study_CenterInfo.centerAdd3, Study_CenterInfo.minTime, Study_CenterInfo.premiumRate, Study_CenterInfo.surchageTime, Study_CenterContents.centerPhoto, Study_CenterFacility.locker, Study_CenterFacility.projector, Study_CenterFacility.printer, Study_CenterFacility.noteBook, Study_CenterFacility.whiteBoard from Study_CenterInfo, Study_CenterContents, Study_CenterFacility where Study_CenterInfo.centerCode = Study_CenterContents.centerCode and Study_CenterInfo.centerCode = Study_CenterFacility.centerCode
and Study_CenterInfo.centerCode = #{centerCode}
